refrain.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to not do something that you want to do
refrain.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Please refrain from smoking in this area.
refrain.translation[1].definitions[0].de: part of a song or poem that is repeated, especially at the end of each verse
refrain.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a remark or idea that is often repeated
refrain.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Our proposal met with the constant refrain that the company could not afford it.
